workflow.name: Create ideal customer profile from websites content to Google Doc
workflow.description:
## Who‚Äôs it for
Growth, marketing, sales, and founder teams that want a **decision-ready Ideal Customer Profile (ICP)**‚Äîgrounded in their own site content.

## How it works / What it does
- **On form submission** collects **Website URL** and **Business Name** and redirects to Google Drive Folder after the final node.  
- **Crawl and Scrape the Website Content** - crawls and scrape **20 pages** from the website. 
- **ICP Creator** builds a **Markdown ICP** with:  
A) **Executive Summary**
B) **One-Pager ICP**
C) **Tiering & Lead Scoring**
D) **Demand Gen & ABM Plays**
E) **Evidence Log**
F) **Section Confidence**
**Facts vs. Inferences**, confidence scores and tables. 
- **Markdown to Google Doc** converts Markdown to Google Docs `batchUpdate` requests. Then this is used in **Update a document** for updating the empty doc. 
- **Create a document** + **Update a document** generate **‚ÄúICP for <Business Name>‚Äù** in your Drive folder and apply formatting.

## How to set up
1) Add credentials: **Firecrawl** (Authorization header), **OpenAI** (Chat), **Google Docs OAuth2**.  
2) Replace placeholders: `{{API_KEY}}`, `{{google_drive_folder_id}}`, `{{google_drive_folder_url}}`.  
3) Publish and open the Form URL to test.

## Requirements
Firecrawl API key ‚Ä¢ OpenAI API key ‚Ä¢ Google account with access to the target Drive folder.

## Resources
Google OAuth2 Credentials Setup - https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/oauth-generic/  
OpenAI API key - https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/openai/  
Firecrawl API key - https://take.ms/lGcUp

parameters.text:
=DATA INPUT
Everything between <website_data> and </website_data> is the ONLY source of truth. Do not browse the web. Do not hallucinate. Quote the site when possible.

<website_data>
{{ JSON.stringify($json.data) }}
</website_data>

OUTPUT FORMAT (MARKDOWN)

Format the entire answer in normal Markdown (headings, lists, short tables).

Start directly with the content. Do not wrap the whole answer in any code fence. Never write ```markdown in the beginning and ```\n at the end, just start with the content.

Keep long sentences out of tables. Tables are for keywords/short phrases/numbers only.

WORKING RULES

Detect context: Decide if the business is B2B, B2C, or Hybrid. If unclear, state the ambiguity and proceed with the most likely case.

Facts vs. Inferences:

Tag direct facts with (Fact) and include a brief quote or field reference.

Tag deductions with (Inference) and add a one-line rationale.

If unknown: ‚ÄúUnknown ‚Äî evidence not found.‚Äù

Specificity over fluff: Prefer concrete ranges and crisp qualifiers (e.g., ‚Äú50‚Äì200 employees‚Äù, ‚ÄúSeries B SaaS‚Äù, ‚ÄúEU/UK‚Äù).

Variants: If multiple products/markets are present, create Primary and Secondary ICP variants and explain why.

Confidence: Add a 0‚Äì100 confidence score per section with a one-line rationale.

Scope control: If data is thin, call it out explicitly and expand the Open Questions list rather than guessing.

DELIVERABLES (produce ALL, in this exact order)

A) Executive Summary (150‚Äì220 words)

What the company sells (1‚Äì2 lines).

Who it is best for (firmographic snapshot).

Why they buy (top 3 pains & triggers).

How to find & win them (channels + core message).

Key uncertainties to validate next.

B) One-Pager ICP (Narrative)

Problem ‚Üí Solution fit (jobs-to-be-done).

‚ÄúWhy now‚Äù triggers (events that create urgency).

Differentiators vs. alternatives (bulleted).

Critical requirements (e.g., security/compliance/integrations).

Risks & exclusions (who is NOT a fit and why).

C) Tiering & Lead Scoring (Concise)

Define T1 (perfect fit), T2 (good fit), T3 (opportunistic).

Provide a scoring formula (0‚Äì100) using the weights from the JSON.

Give 5‚Äì10 example filters for LinkedIn/Sales tools (industry, headcount, tech, geo, keywords).

D) Demand Gen & ABM Plays (Practical)

Top 3 channels and why (1‚Äì2 lines each).

3 campaign ideas mapped to top pains/use cases.

3 sales plays per key persona (opening line + suggested asset).

3 activation metrics to monitor (e.g., %T1 leads, opp rate, win rate).

E) Evidence Log

5‚Äì10 strongest excerpts from the site (short quotes or field names). Tag each (Fact).

F) Section Confidence

For each major section (A‚ÄìF), include confidence 0‚Äì100 with a one-line rationale.

PROCESS (how to work)

Parse <website_data>; if it‚Äôs HTML/JSON, extract product, audience, value props, pricing, industries, logos/case studies, integrations, careers page hints (size/stack), and press pages (stage).

List facts vs. inferences explicitly.

Build Primary ICP; add Secondary if a materially different segment exists.

Construct scoring rubric and tier definitions tied to business realities in the data.

Populate open questions; propose how to validate quickly (calls, analytics, CRM fields).

QUALITY BAR (self-check before finalizing)

Are Facts/Inferences clearly labeled?

Are negative ICP/exclusions present?

Is the scoring rubric actionable and aligned with data?

Are uncertainties and next steps explicit?

Are tables succinct (no long sentences)?

RETURN
Return only the final deliverables in Markdown (sections A‚ÜíF). Do not include your internal notes or this instruction block.

messageValues.message: You are a senior B2B/B2C go-to-market analyst specializing in Ideal Customer Profiles (ICP), Account-Based Marketing (ABM), and sales enablement. Your job is to extract facts, infer patterns cautiously, and produce a rigorous, decision-ready ICP.

values.html:
Enter the company website URL and business name to generate a first‚Äëdraft Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) based on your site‚Äôs content. Once completed, you'll be redirected to a Google Drive folder containing your ICP document.

Here is how the workflow works:

  1. Website is crawled and scraped (sitemap included, up to 20 pages, main content only).
  2. AI ICP Creator analyzes on‚Äësite content only and drafts the ICP (no external browsing, facts vs. inferences).
  3. ICP includes: Executive Summary, One‚ÄëPager ICP, Tiering & Lead Scoring, Demand Gen & ABM Plays, Evidence Log, Section Confidence.
  4. Markdown output is converted into a formatted Google Doc.
  5. Google Doc ‚ÄúICP for <Business Name>‚Äù is created in Google Drive.
  6. You will be redirected to the Google Drive folder containing your ICP.

parameters.content:
## üü® Overview ‚Äî Create ICP from website content to Google Docs

## Who‚Äôs it for
Growth, marketing, sales, and founder teams that want a **decision-ready Ideal Customer Profile (ICP)**‚Äîgrounded in their own site content.

## How it works / What it does
- **On form submission** collects **Website URL** and **Business Name** and redirects to Google Drive Folder after the final node.  
- **Crawl and Scrape the Website Content** - crawls and scrape **20 pages** from the website. 
- **ICP Creator** builds a **Markdown ICP** with:  
A) **Executive Summary**
B) **One-Pager ICP**
C) **Tiering & Lead Scoring**
D) **Demand Gen & ABM Plays**
E) **Evidence Log**
F) **Section Confidence**
**Facts vs. Inferences**, confidence scores and tables. 
- **Markdown to Google Doc** converts Markdown to Google Docs `batchUpdate` requests. Then this is used in **Update a document** for updating the empty doc. 
- **Create a document** + **Update a document** generate **‚ÄúICP for <Business Name>‚Äù** in your Drive folder and apply formatting.

## How to set up
1) Add credentials: **Firecrawl** (Authorization header), **OpenAI** (Chat), **Google Docs OAuth2**.  
2) Replace placeholders: `{{API_KEY}}`, `{{google_drive_folder_id}}`, `{{google_drive_folder_url}}`.  
3) Publish and open the Form URL to test.

## Requirements
Firecrawl API key ‚Ä¢ OpenAI API key ‚Ä¢ Google account with access to the target Drive folder.

## Resources
Google OAuth2 Credentials Setup - https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/oauth-generic/  
OpenAI API key - https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/openai/  
Firecrawl API key - https://take.ms/lGcUp

## üóíÔ∏è Setup checklist (do these before first run)

- **On form submission ‚Üí Respond with redirect**: set `={{google_drive_folder_url}}`.  
- **Create a document ‚Üí folderId**: set `={{google_drive_folder_id}}`.  
- **FireCrawl headers**: `Authorization: Bearer {{API_KEY}}`.  
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: attach your OpenAI credential.  
- **Google Docs OAuth2**: attach to both Docs nodes - Create a document + Update a document. 
- Test with a real site (e.g., `vertodigital.com`) and verify the created Doc & redirect.

user.name: Simeon Penev
user.bio: I specialize in building AI workflows that streamline processes and reduce manual work. My main workflows are in the marketing field, but I can automate all kind of processes and integrate AI in them.
